name: Agate
special_properties: Striped or mossy patterns; often used as simple adornment.

name: Jasper
special_properties: Comes in red, green, or yellow hues; sturdy gemstone.

name: Quartz
special_properties: Clear, smoky, or rose varieties; popular among peasants.

name: Carnelian
special_properties: Deep red-orange; thought to ward against evil.

name: Onyx
special_properties: Black stone with white bands; favored for rings and amulets.

name: Amethyst
special_properties: Purple crystal; sacred to priests, said to resist drunkenness.

name: Lapis Lazuli
special_properties: Deep blue with golden flecks; prized by scholars and nobles.

name: Peridot
special_properties: Bright green stone; said to protect from nightmares.

name: Moonstone
special_properties: Milky stone with shifting sheen; associated with the moon.

name: Ruby
special_properties: Blood-red gem; symbol of passion and war.

name: Emerald
special_properties: Vivid green; flaws often resemble mossy threads.

name: Sapphire
special_properties: Blue gem of royalty; other colors include pink and yellow.

name: Opal
special_properties: Shifts with rainbow colors; fire and black opals are most prized.
